description: Try our easy to follow Italian Pasta with Burrata recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free
name: Italian Pasta with Burrata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of salted, boiling water for 10-12 minutes until al dente. Drain. Return to pan and stir in dressing. Cover to keep warm.

Meanwhile, fry prosciutto in a pan over medium heat for about 1 minute, each side, until crisp. Transfer to a bowl. Add pine nuts to pan and stir over low heat until golden. Break prosciutto into pieces.
Divide cooked pasta between serving bowls. Top with artichokes, tomato, prosciutto and nuts. Tear burrata over the pasta and serve garnished with basil leaves.
